group.name: Plugin Commands: ZigBee Light Link (ZLL) Commissioning
group.description: The ZigBee Light Link (ZLL) Commissioning Plugin contributes several commands to the application framework's CLI. These commands are used for forming and managing a ZLL network.

command.description: Form a ZLL network.

arg.name: channel
arg.description: The channel on which to form the network.

arg.name: power
arg.description: The power setting for network transmissions.

arg.name: panId
arg.description: The PAN identifier for the network.

arg.name: identifyDurationDs
arg.description: The duration (in tenths of a second) of identify mode or 0xFFFF to indicate that the target should use its own application-specific duration.
